feed.title: Owlistic Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Owlistic: Release v0.1.0
New release for Owlistic: Release v0.1.1
New release for Owlistic: Release v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Added floating toolbar by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/12
  • Add inline "/task" command by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/86

üöÄ Enhancements

  • Migrate Kafka producer/consumer to Nats by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/93

üêõ Bug fixes

  • Notes not deleted by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/65
  • Clear preferences on logout by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/62
  • Restore logout confirmation by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/78
  • Fix create button by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/79

üìö Documentation

  • Improve docs by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/82
  • Add gifs to docs by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/83
  • Add screenshots/gifs to readme by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/84
  • Add gif to quickstart by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/85

Other Changes

  • Add release note generator by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/95
  • Fix changelog generator by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/96
  • Add missing changelog: property by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/97
  • Update dependency filter by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/98
  • Fic renovate author name by @DavideRutigliano in https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/owlistic-notes/owlistic/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0
